links.title: Governance Overview
links.content:
[Skip to content](#lfg-main-content)

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb93586/themes/site/client_site_202/local/img/hero-img.jpg)

# Governance Overview

## Corporate Governance Overview

The Board of Directors of Bicara Therapeutics, Inc. (the “Company”) sets high standards for the Company’s employees, officers and directors. Implicit in this philosophy is the importance of sound corporate governance. It is the duty of the Board of Directors to serve as a prudent fiduciary for shareholders and to oversee the management of the Company’s business. To fulfill its responsibilities and to discharge its duty, the Board of Directors follows the procedures and standards that are set forth in these guidelines. These guidelines are subject to modification from time to time as the Board of Directors deems appropriate in the best interests of the Company or as required by applicable laws and regulations.

## Governance Documents

[Code of Business Conduct and Ethics ](/static-files/43e281ed-94d0-435e-90b7-ec78a928def7)

[Corporate Governance Guidelines](/static-files/62569002-5a5a-4aac-a4d4-59932b437b9a)

links.title: Investor FAQs
links.content:
[Skip to content](#lfg-main-content)

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb93586/themes/site/client_site_202/local/img/hero-img.jpg)

# Investor FAQs

[Show All](#)

Press space to expand and collapse this section

Where is Bicara Therapeutics’ corporate headquarters?

Bicara Therapeutics is headquartered at 116 Huntington Avenue, Suite 703, Boston, MA 02116.

Press space to expand and collapse this section

When was Bicara Therapeutics founded?

Bicara Therapeutics was incorporated in December 2018 in Delaware.

Press space to expand and collapse this section

On which exchange is Bicara Therapeutics listed, what is the ticker symbol and when did it go public?

Bicara Therapeutics’ stock is traded on the NASDAQ Global Market under the ticker symbol “BCAX”.

Press space to expand and collapse this section

When is Bicara Therapeutics fiscal year-end?

Bicara Therapeutics’ fiscal year-end is December 31st.

Press space to expand and collapse this section

Who is Bicara Therapeutics transfer agent?

Bicara Therapeutics’ transfer agent is:Computershare Trust Company, N.A.web.queries@computershare.com1-800-736-3001, option 1 (U.S.)1-781-575-3100, option 1 (non-U.S.)

Press space to expand and collapse this section

Who is Bicara’s outside legal counsel and independent auditor?

Bicara Therapeutics’ legal counsel is Goodwin Procter LLP. The company’s independent auditor is KPMG.

Press space to expand and collapse this section

Where can I find the latest corporate news releases and financial reports?

Corporate news can be found in the [News & Events](/news-events/press-releases) section of our Investors webpage. Quarterly and annual reports, as well as other SEC filings, can be found in the [Financials](/financials-filings/sec-filings) section of our Investors webpage or directly from the SEC at www.sec.gov.

Press space to expand and collapse this section

Where can I find copies of Bicara Therapeutics’ financial documents, including annual reports (Form-10K) and quarterly reports (Form 10-Q)?

The Company’s financial documents can be found in the [Financials](/financials-filings/sec-filings) section of our Investors webpage or directly from the SEC at www.sec.gov.

Press space to expand and collapse this section

When and where is the Annual Stockholders’ Meeting?

The date and location of Bicara’s next annual meeting will be communicated prior to the meeting date.

Press space to expand and collapse this section

Whom should I contact regarding investor inquiries?

Please email ir@bicara.com.

Press space to expand and collapse this section

How can I sign up to receive Bicara Therapeutics’ press releases and other company news?

Alerts can be set up from the “[Email Alerts](/resources/email-alerts)” section of the “Investors” page.

Press space to expand and collapse this section

Which analysts cover Bicara?

Our current analyst coverage can be found in the [Stock Information](/stock-information/analyst-coverage) section of our Investors webpage.

Press space to expand and collapse this section

How can I purchase shares?

Shares can be purchased through a stockbroker of your choice.

Press space to expand and collapse this section

Does Bicara have a direct stock purchase plan? 

Bicara does not currently have a direct stock purchase plan.

links.content:

![](/sites/g/files/knoqqb93586/themes/site/client_site_202/local/img/hero-img.jpg)

# Email Alerts

To opt-in for investor email alerts, please select at least one alert option and enter your email address in the field below. After submitting your request, an activation email will be sent to the address provided. You must click the activation link in order to complete your subscription. You can sign up for additional alert options at any time. If you would like to opt out of email alerts, you can [unsubscribe here](/unsubscribe). 

Required fields denoted by an asterisk ().

Alert type* Required

End-of-Day Stock Quote

SEC Filing

Events

Press Releases

Presentations

Weekly Summary

Email* Required

Submit
